SELECT t.id, t.create_name AS createName, t.receiver_name AS receiverName, t.create_time AS createTime, t.title, t.read_flag AS readFlag, t.content, t.business_id AS businessId, s.pc_url AS pcUrl, s.code AS msgPublicTemplateCode, s.name AS msgPublicTemplateName, s.notice_type_code AS noticeTypeCode, t.send_time AS sendTime, (SELECT B.NAME FROM iap_dict_t A LEFT JOIN iap_dict_item_t B ON B.iap_dict_id = A.id WHERE A.CODE = #{status} AND key_value = t.status ) as statusName, (SELECT B.NAME FROM iap_dict_t A LEFT JOIN iap_dict_item_t B ON B.iap_dict_id = A.id WHERE A.CODE = #{serviceModule} AND key_value = s.service_module_code ) as serviceModuleName, (SELECT B.NAME FROM iap_dict_t A LEFT JOIN iap_dict_item_t B ON B.iap_dict_id = A.id WHERE A.CODE = #{sendType} AND key_value = t.send_type ) as sendTypeName FROM msg_send_record t LEFT JOIN msg_public_template s ON t.msg_public_template_id = s.id WHERE t.receiver_uid = #{query.userId} AND t.status = 2 AND t.send_type = 1
AND s.code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.msgPublicTemplateCode},'%')
AND s.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.msgPublicTemplateName},'%')
AND t.receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.receiverName},'%')
AND t.send_time BETWEEN #{query.startTime} AND #{query.endTime}
AND s.service_module_code = #{query.serviceModuleCode}
ORDER BY t.send_time DESC
